knimeNode.name: Analyse sequence (windows)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the user configured data from sequence cells into separate columns for further analysis. See the related String2Sequence node for further information.

fullDescription.intro:
Extracts computational results for a short window(s) of sequence(s) to the output port. You may specify how the window is to be computed and sized, see the Window Settings tab in the configuration for details.
Note:This node can generate lots of data (one row per window per input sequence) so be careful not to generate a massive table!
fullDescription.option: Column to obtain the sequence data from. Each sequence is analysed independently
Specify the data desired. See above table for details.
